edu.unc.ils.mrc.hive2.api.impl
Class HiveVocabularyImpl

java.lang.Object
  edu.unc.ils.mrc.hive2.api.impl.HiveVocabularyImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
HiveVocabulary
public class HiveVocabularyImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements HiveVocabulary

This class represents a single vocabulary in the Hive. Hive is primarily backed by a Sesame/OpenRDF native store with supplemental relational (H2) and full-text (Lucene) stores. The H2 database contains some administrative data as well as a table of brief concept records for fast lookup. The Lucene index contains structured documents for natural language queries over the vocabulary.
